00003 class LayeredNetwork(Network):
00004     def __init__(self, hiddenLayers=0):
00005         Network.__init__(self)
00006         self.doprop = False
00007         self.layers = []
00008         for i in xrange(2+hiddenLayers):
00009             self.layers.append(0)
00010 
00011     def setInput(self, vals):
00012         if len(vals) != len(self.outputs):
00013             raise InputSizeError
00014         #for conn in self.outputs:
00015         #    conn.clear()
00016         for i in xrange(len(vals)):
00017             self.outputs[i].setValue(float(vals[i]))
00018 
00019         #for tnode in self.tnodes.values():
00020         #    tnode.outputs[0].setValue(1.0)
00021         for i in xrange(len(self.layers)):
00022             for j in xrange(self.layers[i]):
00023                 node = self.nodes[(i,j)]
00024                 node.onInput()
00025 
00026         #self.outputs[len(vals)].setValue(1.0)

00028     def addNode(self, threshold, layer):
00029         if layer > len(self.layers):
00030             raise AddError(layer)
00031         if layer == -1:
00032             layer = len(self.layers)-1
00033         elif layer < -1:
00034             raise AddError(layer)
00035         id = (layer, self.layers[layer])
00036         self.layers[layer] += 1
00037         Network.addNode(self, id, threshold)
00038         node = self.nodes[id]
00039         if layer != 0:
00040             for i in xrange(self.layers[layer-1]):
00041                 self.addConnection((layer-1, i), id)
00042         if layer != len(self.layers)-1:
00043             for j in xrange(self.layers[layer+1]):
00044                 self.addConnection(id, (layer+1, j))
00045         return id
00046 
00047     def addToInputLayer(self):
00048         i = self.addNode(None, 0)
00049         self.addInput(i)
00050 
00051     def addToOutputLayer(self, threshold):
00052         o = self.addNode(threshold, -1)
00053         self.addOutput(o)
00054 
00055     def getOutputNodes(self):
00056         outlayer = len(self.layers)-1
00057         layer = []
00058         for i in xrange(self.layers[outlayer]):
00059             layer.append(self.nodes[(outlayer, i)])
00060         return layer
00061 
00062 class AddError(Exception):
00063     def __init__(self, value):
00064         self.value = value
00065         print "Undefined Layer: ", value
00066     def __str__(self):
00067         return repr(self.value)
